titles.title: Broadband Equipment Rental Reform Act
To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit providers of broadband internet access service from charging consumers above certain amounts for certain equipment.
Broadband Equipment Rental Reform Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Communications and Technology.

bill.summary:
Broadband Equipment Rental Reform Act
This bill prohibits a broadband internet provider from charging a consumer for the rental, lease, or provision of equipment if the consumer has paid the purchase price of such equipment through monthly rental fees.
